name: Morning Wake Up
description: A gentle flow to wake up your body and mind. Perfect for starting the day with intention and flexibility.

exercises.name: Neck Rolls
exercises.description: Gently roll your head in a circular motion to release tension.

exercises.name: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.description: Lift your shoulders up to your ears and release them down.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Flow between arching and rounding your back to warm up the spine.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Rest your hips back on your heels and reach your arms forward.

name: Lower Body Mobility
description: Focus on opening up the hips, hamstrings, and calves. Great for runners or after sitting all day.

exercises.name: Forward Fold
exercises.description: Hinge at the hips and let your head hang heavy.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description: Bring the soles of your feet together and let your knees drop open.

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose (Left)
exercises.description: Bring your left knee forward and extend your right leg back.

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose (Right)
exercises.description: Bring your right knee forward and extend your left leg back.

exercises.name: Supine Twist
exercises.description: Lie on your back and twist your knees to one side.

name: Sleep Easy
description: A calming routine to prepare your body for deep sleep.

exercises.name: Legs Up The Wall
exercises.description: Lie on your back with your legs extending up the wall.

exercises.name: Reclined Bound Angle
exercises.description: Lie back with soles of feet touching, knees open.

exercises.name: Happy Baby
exercises.description: Hold onto your feet and gently rock side to side.
